SEARCH
Package pointOfSales.entities

Class product

java.lang.Object
pointOfSales.entities.product
public class product extends Object
Represents a product with associated details such as name, price, and category.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    product(Connection conn)
    Constructs a product object initializing the database connection.
    product(Connection conn, String Name, String Category)
    Constructs a product object with name and category.
    product(Connection conn, String Name, String Category, Double Price)
    Constructs a product object with name, category, and price.
